abstract: The mining giant BHP Billiton has approached sub-underwriting banks in an effort to secure a record $55 billion loan to back its hostile bid for its rival Rio Tinto, according to Reuters.

headline.main: BHP Billiton in Talks for Record $55 Billion Loan
